page.shortlink: api extension namespace json class to result set method
page.description: Create a result set from json and optional table info (schema).
page.prototype: .ToResultSet as SQL::ResultSet (json as C [, tableInfo as P [, alias as C]])
page.example:
dim json_i as c = <<%json% [ {"ID" : "1", "Company" : "Company A", "Last_Name" : "Bedecs", "First_Name" : "Anna"}, {"ID" : "2", "Company" : "Company B", "Last_Name" : "Gratacos Solsona", "First_Name" : "Antonio"}, {"ID" : "3", "Company" : "Company C", "Last_Name" : "Axen", "First_Name" : "Thomas"} ]
%json%
dim b as office::exceldocument
dim rs as sql::ResultSet
rs = extension::json::ToResultSet(json_i) ?rs.ToCSV(.t.) ID,Company,Last_Name,First_Name 1,Company A,Bedecs,Anna 2,Company B,Gratacos Solsona,Antonio 3,Company C,Axen,Thomas
